• Lektora - News in Firefox and Internet Explorer with RSS.
    Windows only. Doesn't seem any better than NetNewsWire or FeedDemon - "Lektora gathers the latest news from your favorite web sites and builds you an easy-to-read virtual newspaper."
    Tags: blogs, rss, windozeonly
  • Lifeblog: still gratuitously incompatible with most blogging systems
    Other than lock-in, I see no reason why this couldn't work with any MetaWeblog API system. - "The only blog service that is compatible right now with Lifeblog is Six Apart's TypePad weblogging service."
    Tags: howtodevelopsoftware, lifeblog
